title-page.h3: I fill the web with quality.
title-page.p: I’m a software engineer based in Warsaw, Poland specializing in building websites, web applications and everything in between.

about-me.p:nth-child(1): I’m Dawid, a software developer based in Warsaw, Poland
about-me.p:nth-child(2): I’m studying computer science at WULS in Warsaw (2nd year). I enjoy creating content which can be visible on the Internet - websites, web applications and other digital content.
about-me.p:nth-child(3): I worked for GREY, as a front-end developer. I’ve been providing quality to landing pages, mailings and HTML5 banners for widely known companies like PEPCO, Cyfrowy Polsat and mBank.
about-me.p:nth-child(4): My goal is to constantly make progress and learn new things. Every project is unique and brings new challenges to face.

contact.p: My inbox is open for job and contract offers. If you need a website web application suited for your needs - I’m sure we can make a deal. If you’re a recruiter or company owner and you’re looking for a developer - don’t hesitate to mail me.
